name: Sineful
description:
You are a sine wave

Experience an experimental game where you control a sine wave's frequency and amplitude to avoid obstacles and collect squares to increase your score.

Zone out

The better you do, the more colorful the game becomes, and the more instruments join in the song. 

You can also try Zen Mode, and just relax while you play with fewer things to focus on.

Accessibility

For those with epilepsy, or who experience eye strain or motion sickness, there are adjustable settings to make the game as accessible as possible.

Bonus Soundtrack

Buy now and get the song, Tangential Dreams, for free!
